I bought this shirt May of 2024. It is now September of 2024 and pretty much right after I bought this shirt, wore it about 3 times and washed it, It started to get white spots/fading at the bottom of the shirt. You can see it in the pictures I'm attaching. I wash my shirts in cold on gentle cycle, use baby detergent (have very sensitive skin) and hang my shirts to dry. All my clothes stay in great condition for this reason. So this isn't by error or fault on my part. This shirt isn't a good quantity made shirt and absolutely shouldn't be getting white spots on it this quickly. It's a waste of money. Also the print itself had already started cracking on spots all over the printed design. I do not recommend this shirt at all. I'm very disappointed in the quality of the print and the quality of the shirt.

评论概述: Pretty feminine design that is comfy and flattering
评论详情: I needed a change from all my solid tops. I bought in 2 colors/designs (Lt Blue & Yellow/green) and sized up to XL to be sure would fit for a trip. Comfy, packs & washes well, and got alot of compliments. So when I returned I bought Dk. Blue in L (my usual size - I'm petite, but busty.) and it fit more like my usual tops. However, it wasn't as flattering and the larger XL looked better on. Don't know why that is, but that's what worked for me. I returned the L.
